mapper.select: select refereeId from referee order by refereeId desc limit 1
select * from referee where refereeId in (select isReferee from user where userAccount = #{userAccount})
mapper.insert: insert into referee (refereeId, name, telephoneNumber, refereeNumber,isWorking) value (#{refereeId},#{name},#{telephoneNumber},#{refereeNumber},0)
mapper.update: update referee set name=#{name},telephoneNumber=#{telephoneNumber},refereeNumber=#{refereeNumber},isWorking=#{isWorking} where refereeId in (select isReferee from user where userAccount=#{userAccount} and userPassword=#{userPassword})
update user set isReferee=-1 where userAccount=#{userAccount} and userPassword=#{userPassword}
